name: Ouroboros Blade
description: The attack speed was as quick as the snake-like lightning. The sharp cut was as fatal as a snakebite.

name: Ouroboros Bow
description: Bow and arrow made of snake's bones, which could break through any armor like a piece of paper.

name: Ouroboros Hammer
description: The body of the hammer was made of gold. The deafening attack sound of the hammer would make the enemies pass out.

name: Ouroboros Katar
description: Katar made of sharp teeth of the ancient giant serpent.

name: Ouroboros Shield
description: The thick Snake Scales of the red snake can defend strong attack power and bounce it back.

name: Ouroboros Spear
description: Snake-shaped spear that can slit the wound and take the enemy's blood.

name: Ouroboros Staff
description: The magic power borrowed from the serpent in the darkness can make enemies lost in endless reincarnations.

name: Ouroboros Sword
description: The cursed long sword that killed snakes. The barb of the handle gave out a sense of danger like the snake's tail.

name: Ox Bone Helm
description: A helmet crafted with animal bones.

name: Oxygen Mask
description: It has the same name of the oxygen mask used in water, but please note that the function is different.

name: Oxygen Mask Blueprint
description: It has the same name of the oxygen mask used in water, but please note that the function is different.

name: P. Bow
description: It can make precise shooting and create high damage. This advantage makes users like it even more.

name: P. Bow [2]
description: It can make precise shooting and create high damage. This advantage makes users like it even more.

name: P. Staff
description: A weapon that is more powerful than a normal Rod.
